gameDetails.name: Alien Frontiers: Expansion Pack #7
gameDetails.description:
Originally offered as a bonus for preordering the Alien Frontiers: Outer Belt expansion, it was also made available for purchase upon the Outer Belt's release.

Components


     3 Alien Tech Cards (for use with Alien Frontiers)
         Neutrino Missile Salvo
         Pocket Universe
         Ring Repeater
    
     2 Salvage Cards (for use with Alien Frontiers: Outer Belt)
         Micro-Singularity
         Tactical Meteoroids
